template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Therapy Practice package!
This module provides a comprehensive suite of applications tailored to the needs of therapy practices, empowering you to manage your business efficiently and deliver exceptional patient care.
By installing this package, you'll have access to a range of essential apps, including CRM, Appointment and Invoicing. Let's explore how these modules can streamline your therapy practice operations.
Getting Started To begin, you'll find the key applications you need on your Odoo dashboard. Let's take a closer look at how you can use these tools.

div.a: Do you want to go further?

template.p: You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

ul.li: The CRM App(Customer Relationship Management) is the heart of your therapy practice's patient management.
The Appointments App manages your appointment types.

font.span: Manage your schedule and your availability in the

ul.li: Ease your invoicing process with the Invoice App.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: Odoo is entirely integrated into an App. Download it to turn your phone to manage your entire business in it.

template.p: By uploading this module's demo data, your database has been filled with a few contacts.
You should be able to execute the following flows to have an overview of various flows you can quickly execute with this package using Odoo.
Of course, this is just an overview of the features included in this package. Feel free to add new apps, delete/modify demo data, and test everything around!

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-warning pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You didn't import demo data? You can still do it. Go to Apps > Industries > Upgrade your Therapy Practice package and check the related box.

template.p: You receive a call from a new potential patient, Emily, who is interested in your therapy services.
In the CRM App, you create a new lead for Emily, capturing her contact information and the reason for her inquiry.
As you qualify Emily's needs, you update the lead status to "Qualified" in the CRM pipeline.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You can also configure an email alias so everyone sending email to this one will create a new opportunity for you.
To do so, go to CRM > Configuration > Sales Teams.

template.p: If you open Emily's opportunity in your CRM, you can see in the Chatter (on the right column) that she received an email from you with a call to action to book an appointment.
Try it !
If you want to share your calendar easily, navigate to the Appointment App and select "Share" on the Edit Button.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You may also create a personalized website in a few clicks by adding the Website App, your appointment page will be automatically added.

template.p: After each appointment, an automatic email will be sent to suggest your patient to already book its next appointment.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You can set the consultation with an upfront online payment. Activate it in your Appointment Type Settingsby setting up an upfront payment method.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: If you want to adapt your flow and set new automation rules, click the Gear Icon in the top of a CRM column and select "Automation", or add automated email in your Appointment Type.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: To reduce your no show rate drastically, appointments automatically comes with reminders by Email and SMS.

template.p: Once the appointment is booked, navigate to the Calendar App. You may find the new appointment. You can also move it (Emily will be notified) or cancel it.
The Appointment App is automatically updated based on your Calendar. You can easily lock slots, change appointment hoursand send communication to your patients fromthe Calendar App.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: The Odoo Calendar App is compatible with Outlook and Google Calendar. Activate the sync in the Calendar App settings.

template.p: Using Odoo, you can easily take notes during your appointments, you can either use the "Log Note" button on your contact record or create a specific knowledge article (like this one) for each of your patient.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-warning pb-0 pt-3

div.p: Be careful, using the "Log Note" in your contact with be displayed only for you and your eventual team. If you select the "Send message" option, this will notify your customer (which can be really interesting also).

template.p: If you navigate to the Invoice App, you can manage your invoices. You have many possibilities to streamline your invoicing process:

ul.li: Auto-post your invoice on a regular basis.
Add an upfront payment in your Appointment Type.
Add the Subscription App and invoice automatically based on a subscription type.
